GLOBAL.BETA_WARNING: This website is under active development and everything is subject to change. We can't guarantee for the safety and privacy of the data you enter (but we try our best).
GLOBAL.INVALID_LINK: Sorry, the link you've opened is invalid.

REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.SUCCESS: We sent you an e-mail with a link to complete the deletion process.

REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account deletion
REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.MESSAGE: Are you sure? Your account and your personal data will be permanently deleted. Anything you have done on this platform will be made anonymous. If you confirm, we send you an e-mail with a link to complete the deletion process.

VALIDATION.MAXLENGTH: Too long, please use less than {max} characters.
VALIDATION.UNIQUE: Name already exists, please choose another.

GROUP.LEAVE_TEXT: Are you sure you want to leave this group?
GROUP.NONMEMBER_REDIRECT: You are not a member of this group.
GROUP.TITLE: Title of this group
GROUP.PUBLIC_DESCRIPTION: Text you see before joining the group
GROUP.PASSWORD: Enter a password here if you want to make the group private
GROUP.INVITED_LIST: Invitations have already been sent out to these e-mail addresses:
GROUP.ALREADY_INVITED: An invitation has already been sent to this e-mail address
GROUP.INVITATION_ACCEPT_SUCCESS: Welcome! You successfully accepted the invitation.
GROUP.INVITATION_ACCEPT_ERROR: Ooops, could not accept the invitation!

weekly_summary.NAME: Weekly summary
weekly_summary.DESCRIPTION: Keep up to date with what's been happening in the group.

daily_pickup_notification.NAME: Pickup notifications
daily_pickup_notification.DESCRIPTION: Reminds you of your pickups, and tells you about empty or not-full pickups in the next day

GROUP.PLAYGROUND_INFO: This is a playground group, you can't break anything. Explore, click around and have fun!
GROUP.JOIN_PLAYGROUND: Join the playground group to explore karrot

STOREDETAIL.INACTIVE: This store is currently not cooperating.
STOREDETAIL.CHANGE_STATUS: You can change the status on the settings page.
STOREDETAIL.NO_DESCRIPTION: This store does not have a description yet

STOREEDIT.NAME: Name
STOREEDIT.WEEKS_IN_ADVANCE: How many weeks in advance should recurring pickup dates be shown?

PICKUPDELETE.DELETE_SERIES_TEXT: Do you really want to delete this recurring pickup date? This will also delete all one-time pickup dates that belong to this recurring pickup date (except where people joined already).

JOINGROUP.WHICHGROUP: Which group do you want to join?
JOINGROUP.NO_PUBLIC_DESCRIPTION: (This group has no public description... yet)
JOINGROUP.SIGNUP_OR_LOGIN: Log in or sign up to join this group!

LOGOUT_MESSAGE.LOG_IN: Log in to see your groups!

JOINGROUP.PROFILE_NOTE: By joining this group, your profile data will become visible to other group members.

GROUPINFO.TITLE: Public group information
GROUPINFO.MEMBER_VIEW: You are member of this group. Click here to switch to full view.

SIDENAV.INFO_SUB: How to build your foodsaving group
SIDENAV.BLOG_SUB: All news around the karrot software

VERIFYMAIL.TITLE: E-Mail verification
VERIFYMAIL.SUCCESS: Your e-mail address was successfully verified!

CREATEPICKUP.WEEKDAYS_HELPER: On which days should the pick-up take place?
CREATEPICKUP.RRULE_HELPER: Type in a valid {ruleHelper}, e.g. {ruleExample} or {ruleExample2}
CREATEPICKUP.TIME_HELPER: When should the pick-up take place?
CREATEPICKUP.DATE_HELPER: When should the pick-up take place?
CREATEPICKUP.MAX_COLLECTORS_HELPER: How many people should participate in the pick-up?
CREATEPICKUP.COMMENT_HELPER: What should people know when signing up to this pick-up?
CREATEPICKUP.DELETION_FORBIDDEN_HELPER: This pick-up can't be deleted because people already signed up for it

PICKUPLIST.AVAILABLE: There is one pickup in the next days waiting for you! | There are {count} pickups in the next days waiting for you!
PICKUPLIST.AVAILABLE_FEEDBACK: You can give feedback to a pickup | {count} pickups await your feedback
PICKUPLIST.JOINEDNOTICE: You have one upcoming pickup | You have {count} upcoming pickups

ITEM.JOIN_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you have time to pick up on {date}?
ITEM.LEAVE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you really sure the others can do the pickup without you?

PICKUPLIST.NONE_HINT: You can create a new pickup on the store page.
PICKUPLIST.STORE_NONE_HINT: You can create a new pickup on the pickup manage page.

FEEDBACKLIST.SAVED_FOOD: At least 1 kg was saved here. Thank you! | People gave feedback for {amount} kg of saved food already! Keep up the great work!
FEEDBACKLIST.NONE_HINT: This page will be filled once more feedback is available
FEEDBACKLIST.NO_DONE_PICKUPS_HINT: You currently have no pickups to give feedback to. Why not join another pickup?

PICKUP_FEEDBACK.TITLE: Feedback
PICKUP_FEEDBACK.SUBTITLE: You can provide feedback for your pickup here
PICKUP_FEEDBACK.AMOUNT: Amount of food all of you were able to save (in kg)
PICKUP_FEEDBACK.COMMENT_PLACEHOLDER: Was everything fine? Did everyone show up? Your comment here...

PASSWORDRESET.TITLE: Password reset
PASSWORDRESET.INTRO: Enter your Email address and we will send you a link to set a new password (if you have an account registered).
PASSWORDRESET.SUCCESS: The request was successfully sent. Have a look at your Emails!

RESET.TITLE: Reset password
RESET.SUCCESS: Your new password has been saved.

CHANGE.SUCCESS: Your new password has been saved.

HISTORY.GROUP_MODIFY: changed the settings of this group
HISTORY.PICKUP_MODIFY: changed the settings of a pick-up
HISTORY.SERIES_MODIFY: changed the settings of a recurring pick-up
HISTORY.PICKUP_JOIN: signed up to do a pick-up at {storeName}
HISTORY.PICKUP_LEAVE: stepped back from doing a pick-up at {storeName}

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Notifications
NOTIFICATIONS.VERIFICATION_EMAIL_SENT: We sent you another verification mail. Please check your inbox.
NOTIFICATIONS.CHANGES_ERROR: An error occured. Try again later.
NOTIFICATIONS.EMAIL_NOT_DELIVERED: An email could not be delivered to you | {count} emails could not be delivered to you

OUTDATED_BROWSER.MESSAGE: You are using an unsupported browser. {upgradeBrowser} to enjoy all features.
OUTDATED_BROWSER.LINK: Please update or switch your browser

UPDATE_AVAILABLE.TITLE: Update available
UPDATE_AVAILABLE.DETAIL: A new version of karrot is available.

NOT_FOUND.EXPLANATION: Sorry, we couldn't find this page anywhere.

AGREEMENT.TITLE: Title
AGREEMENT.TITLE_HELPER: Give your agreement a title, e.g. Community Rules
AGREEMENT.MINOR_EDIT_HELPER: Typos, formatting, etc... people will not be asked to re-agree
AGREEMENT.BLURB1: You don't have an agreement yet!
AGREEMENT.BLURB2: If you add one then people will have to agree to it before they can do pickups.

REPLACE.TITLE: Change agreement?
REPLACE.MESSAGE: Everyone will have to agree again before they can signup for pickups

REMOVE.TITLE: Remove agreement?
REMOVE.MESSAGE: This means anyone will be able to do a pickup

WALL.DISABLE_NOTIFICATION_EMAILS: Notification e-mails enabled, click to mute
WALL.ENABLE_NOTIFICATION_EMAILS: Notification e-mails muted, click to enable
WALL.VERIFY_EMAIL_FOR_NOTIFICATIONS: Please verify your e-mail address to receive notification e-mails
WALL.RECEIVED_VIA_EMAIL: This message was sent via e-mail

CONVERSATION.UNREAD_MESSAGES: You have one unread message. | You have {count} unread messages.
